page.title: 19RELIGION IN THORNBURY AREA
page.content: The following religious dominations are represented within the Thornbury area: {CHURCH OF ENGLAND:}Parish Church of St Mary's with adjacent vicarage, church hall in Eastlands Road, and connections with the school in Church Road. St Arilda's at Oldbury. {METHODISTS:}Chapels at Thornbury and Oldbury,vicarage in Chantry Road. {ROMAN CATHOLICS:}Church and hall in Castle Street, and connections with school in Easton Hill Road. {UNITED REFORM CHURCH:}and hall at the corner of Chapel Street and Rock St. {QUAKERS:}meet at the Chantry. Their church has recently been demolished to make way for Quaker Court. {BAPTISTS:}Chapel in Pullins Green. {CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP:}Armstrong Hall. {JEHOVA'S WITNESS:}Kingdom Hall in Pullins Green.
